description: This table contains information on transactions that were either: * Transferred * Voided * Reversed * Retroadjudicated

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: OLD_ETR_ID
columns.description: This item holds a pointer for a transaction that was reposted retroactively to the original transaction.

columns.name: REPOSTED_ETR_ID
columns.description: This item stores a pointer to the old transaction in the case of charge correction or repost.

columns.name: REPOST_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This indicates the type of repost on the source transaction.  This is either set to repost or correction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Repost


Correction

columns.name: IS_RETRO_TX
columns.description: This item serves as a flag to determine if this transaction was voided as a result of retroadjudication.

columns.name: TRANS_TX_ID
columns.description: This item stores a pointer to the transaction ID that this transaction was transferred from. This item is only populated if a transaction was transferred from another transaction.

columns.name: TRANS_FROM_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item stores the void status of the transferred from transaction for this transaction.  This item is only populated if this transaction was transferred from a different account.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


VOID-SAME BATCH


VOID-DIFFERENT BATCH


REVERSED

columns.name: RETRO_CHARGE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the transaction ID for the reposted transaction caused by the retroadjudication of this transaction.

columns.name: DEL_REVERSE_DATE
columns.description: This is the date that the transaction was voided or reversed.

columns.name: DEL_CHARGE_USER_ID
columns.description: This item stores the user who voided this transaction.

columns.name: DEL_CHARGE_INSTANT
columns.description: This item stores the instant that a transaction was voided.

columns.name: IS_REVERSED_C_NAME
columns.description:
This flag determines if a transaction has been reversed.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


YES

columns.name: VOIDED_BY_MSG_YN
columns.description:
This flag is set if the charge was voided as a result of a Charge Router message.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: VOID_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason for voiding/reversing category ID for the transaction


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 No Entries Defined

columns.name: VOIDED_BY_CGR_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates that a charge is voided by charge router.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: IS_REVERSED_C_NAME
